item.title: Model controllers in Swift
item.description: John Sundell demonstrates how we can use dedicated model controllers to improve code encapsulation, giving each defined type a very distinct and clearly defined area of responsibility.

item.title: Preventing views from being model aware in Swift
item.description: In this edition of Swift by Sundell, John presents a few different approaches which can be used to decouple our UI code from our model code.
